Text: Is there any chance of the CD that goes with the book, thanks for posting the book!

Did not even realize there were exercises. I bought the digital version of the book and just uploaded that. No mention of the exercises were made by the seller. If you still want the MOBI format (for a Kindle or iPad), then download this. http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6046852/Adobe_Photoshop_CS5_Classroom_in_a_Book_with_Exercices
